== OS Installation Notes ==

This script and it's associated packages have been tested on the following Linux distributions -

K12LTSP-4.4.1 (K-12 Linux Terminal Server Project http://www.k12ltsp.org)

Fedora Core 4 (http://fedora.redhat.com)

Ubuntu (server) (http://www.ubuntulinux.org)

Ubuntu (http://www.ubuntulinux.org)

EdUbuntu (http://www.edubuntu.org)
